ohloh.description: MOVIM (My Open Virtual Identity Manager) is a XMPP based social network software project. It is Free Software under AGPLv3 license and decentralised. End users may either join the network from a remote node or install their own Movim node.
ohloh.name: MOVIM

description: [Movim](http://movim.eu/) is a decentralized open source social network based on XMPP.
name: Movim
